title: From the First
description: Racing from the truth may lead to a larger crash…I have frontman good looks, I’m the lead singer of a chart-climbing band, and I have cash to burn. My life is a twenty-two-year-old’s dream. But fame and fortune don’t quiet the demons of my past. And now, shy, sultry Evie gives me something better to desire… When the girl in Evie’s custody faces crisis, we have one reckless shot to take Paige’s future into our hands: get married, and fast. Evie and I can keep Paige safe while we sate the lust that taunts us. All minus any messy feelings. Don’t miss the chance to lose your heart to Evie, Kai, Paige and their cirlce of friends in this steamy saga of family and love from a USA Today bestselling author.
author: Alexa Padgett
